creator.name: Bots, Amandus Hubertus en Arnoldus Gerardus Bots
creator.name_english: Bots, Amandus Hubertus and Arnoldus Gerardus Bots
creator.his_func: In 1853 the brothers A.H. (1816-1878) and A.G. (1826-1882) Bots from Helmond bought the Esthersrust cotton plantation on the Warappa channel in Suriname. To administer their interests in Suriname, they enlisted the firm J. Haase & Son from Amsterdam. The Bots brothers also owned the Killenstein cotton plantation on the Commewijne River in Suriname.
